identity.mission: Create a unique, trust-building, and action-oriented digital presence for Star Marketing NGO.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Precision' (for transparency) with 'Organic Warmth' (for community).
Emotion First: Every pixel must convey 'Hope' and 'Trust'.
Content is King: Storytelling drives the layout, not the other way around.
Zoom In: Use close-up photography to create intimacy with beneficiaries.
Negative Space: Use generous whitespace to let the mission breathe.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and card headers.

primary.description: Deep Teal - Represents stability, nature, and trust.

secondary.description: Vibrant Saffron - Represents energy, action, and cultural resonance.

background.description: Warm Stone/Paper - Avoid clinical white. Use #FAFAF9 for light mode base.

surface.description: Pure white for cards to pop against the warm background.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")
textures.usage: Apply as a subtle overlay on solid teal backgrounds to remove digital flatness.

dashboard.sidebar: Fixed width (w-64), dark mode by default for contrast.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold
buttons.ghost: text-stone-600 hover:text-primary hover:bg-stone-100 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.feature: bg-white rounded-xl border border-stone-100 shadow-card hover:shadow-floating transition-all duration-300 p-6 group
cards.donation: bg-white rounded-xl border-t-4 border-primary shadow-card p-8 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-stone-50 border-stone-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg

hero.alt: Happy children in school uniforms representing education initiatives
hero.treatment: Use with a gradient overlay or in a shaped mask (not a simple rectangle).

empowerment.alt: Group of women standing together representing empowerment
empowerment.treatment: Black and white filter on hover, or vice versa.

medical.treatment: Use as a background texture with high blur.

motion.scroll_reveal: Use Framer Motion for 'whileInView' animations (fade up + scale).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #1C1917 on light backgrounds. Use #FFFFFF on Primary Teal.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'Bootstrap' layouts. Use asymmetry.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use #1C1917.
DO NOT use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
ALWAYS use 'Manrope' for headings and 'Public Sans' for body.
Ensure all forms have proper validation states (red for error, teal for success).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the Star Marketing NGO platform. Use the JSON data above to guide every design decision. Start by setting up the Tailwind config with the specified colors and fonts. Then, build the Public Website first, focusing on the 'Hero' and 'Donation' flows. Use the provided image URLs. Do not ask for clarification; assume the persona of a senior lead developer and execute with confidence.
